# f5distributedcloud_public_ip (Data Source)

Fetches information about an existing F5 Distributed Cloud Public IP.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the public IP to look up.
- `namespace` (String) Namespace where the public IP exists.

### Read-Only

- `description` (String) Description of the public IP.
- `id` (String) Unique identifier of the public IP.
